Trade/Device Name(s): Applied Biosystems TaqPath COVID-19, Flu A, Flu B, RSV Select Panel
Applied Biosystems TaqPath COVID‑19, Flu A, Flu B, RSV Select Panel
TaqPath COVID-19, Flu A, Flu B, RSV Select Panel
TaqPath™ COVID‑19, Flu A, Flu B, RSV Select Panel
Submitter Information: Life Technologies Corporation (a legal entity of Thermo Fisher Scientific)
Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The Sars-Cov-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Analyte(s): Respiratory syncytial virus (NP, M, L protein genes)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems QuantStudio 5 Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Multiplex real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Applied Biosystems TaqPath COVID-19, Flu A, Flu B, RSV Select Panel, a multiplex RT-PCR panel for detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A/B, and RSV from respiratory swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A virus, influenza B virus, and RSV in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swab specimens from individuals with symptoms of respiratory infection, aiding differential diagnosis.
